description.value:
Minor Curse: You heart churns with remorse. Each day, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1 as a specific misdeed plays out in your mind over and over in guilt.

You canâ€™t remove this condition, though it abates enough for you to quickly eat and drink when necessary. If you make amends or otherwise earnestly pursue redemption for the misdeed, the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition fades completely that day.
